text: @realDonaldTrump Shut your damned mouth UNLESS you are now prepared to be HONEST with the AMERICAN PEOPLE!!! I am so sick and tired of YOU and all your lies --- from campaigning lies to COVID-19 lies. YOU BASTARD!!! YOU and your lies are killing thousands!!! Happy now, coward???
